full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MAndAL GYI DMIGS RIM GSAL BAR STON PA PHAN BDE'I CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,CES MAndAL GYI DMIGS RIM GSAL BAR STON PA PHAN BDE'I CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD STOBS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA SKYID GRONG RDZONG BZHUGS GRONG PO CHE BA DE PA TSE DBANG BAG GROS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG @011B DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BTEN NAS, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BO'I ? DU 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
